```js
    <Tooltip message="Tooltip">
        <Button color="primary" className="Button--primary">Tooltip</Button>
    </Tooltip>
    <Tooltip wide message="Lorem Ipsum Dolor sit amet consteur il amet dos el 123">
        <Button color="primary">Wide Tooltip</Button>
    </Tooltip>

    <Tooltip bottom message="Tooltip">
        <Button color="primary" className="Button--primary">Tooltip Bottom</Button>
    </Tooltip>
    <Tooltip bottom wide message="Lorem Ipsum Dolor sit amet consteur il amet dos el 123">
        <Button color="primary">Wide Tooltip Bottom</Button>
    </Tooltip>

    <Tooltip wide message="This is a long tooltip on a card.">
        <Card>Cards! Cards! Cards!</Card>
    </Tooltip>
```
